Detailed Description

Filter handler for the current user

Member Function Documentation

views_handler_filter_user_current::construct (  ) 

Views handlers use a special construct function so that we can more easily construct them with variable arguments.

Reimplemented from views_handler_filter_boolean_operator.

views_handler_filter_user_current::query (  ) 

Add this filter to the query.

Due to the nature of fapi, the value and the operator have an unintended level of indirection. You will find them in $this->operator and $this->value respectively.

Reimplemented from views_handler_filter_boolean_operator.
